Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/12/1966 to a 3-year deal worth $5,754,000 per year...
Injured on 6/25/1966 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/4/1969 to a 1-year deal worth $2,050,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Texas in 1971...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 6/3/1972 (Going to TEX: 1B H. Killebrew. Going to CLE: P J. Bethke, 2B P. Garner, LF A. Mora)...
Injured on 8/17/1972 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/20/1973 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/8/1973, off Ken Forsch (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/1973, off Ron Bryant (BOS)...
